statements.statements: if (type in $L.item~="bundle" and $createSubscription) then (subscription in $L.cart.item.temp=true;subscriptionItem in $L.cart.item.temp=subscriptionItem in $L.item) else (subscription in $L.cart.item.temp=false;requested.for.type in $L.cart.item.temp="individual";requested.for in $L.cart.item.temp=$requested.for;requested.for.dept in $L.cart.item.temp=NULL)

if (type in $L.item~="bundle" and $createSubscription and $requested.for.type="department" and null($requested.for.dept)) then ($requested.for.type="individual";$requested.for=nullsub($L.requested.for, $lo.contact.name);requested.for in $L.cart.item.temp=$requested.for)

if (type in $L.item~="bundle" and $createSubscription and $requested.for.type="individual") then (requested.for.type in $L.cart.item.temp="individual";requested.for in $L.cart.item.temp=$requested.for;requested.for.dept in $L.cart.item.temp=NULL)

if (type in $L.item~="bundle" and $createSubscription and $requested.for.type="department") then (requested.for.type in $L.cart.item.temp="department";requested.for.dept in $L.cart.item.temp=$requested.for.dept;requested.for in $L.cart.item.temp=NULL)

if (type in $L.item="bundle") then (subscription in $L.cart.item.temp=false;subscriptionItem in $L.cart.item.temp=NULL;requested.for.type in $L.cart.item.temp=NULL;requested.for in $L.cart.item.temp=$requested.for;requested.for.dept in $L.cart.item.temp=NULL)

if $full.name then ($L.fullnamechanged=null($requested.for.fullname) or not (same($L.requested.for.fullname, $requested.for.fullname));if $L.fullnamechanged then ($requested.for=NULL);if (not (null($requested.for))) then ($L.contact=jscall("userUtils.findContactByField", "contact.name", $requested.for)) else ($L.count=jscall("userUtils.countContactByField", "full.name", $requested.for.fullname);if (1=$L.count) then ($L.contact=jscall("userUtils.findContactByField", "full.name", $requested.for.fullname);$requested.for=contact.name in $L.contact))) else ($L.contact=jscall("userUtils.findContactByField", "contact.name", $requested.for))
if (not (null($L.contact))) then (requested.for in $L.cart.item.temp=contact.name in $L.contact;requested.for.fullname in $L.cart.item.temp=full.name in $L.contact)

for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(bundle in $L.item)) do ($L.selected=false;if (3 in $L.i in bundle in $L.item="mandatory") then ($L.selected=true) else ($L.selected=val(jscall("svcCatBundles.isSelected", options in $L.item, "opt"+$L.i), 4));$L.selected=nullsub($L.selected, false);if (not ($L.selected)) then ($L.index=index(2 in $L.i in bundle in $L.item, $L.bundle.items);$L.bundle.items=delete($L.bundle.items, $L.index);$L.bundle.types=delete($L.bundle.types, $L.index);$L.bundle.subscriptionItem=delete($L.bundle.subscriptionItem, $L.index)))
